General.Name: HOV Services Limited
General.Description: HOV Services Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides software and IT enabled services in India and internationally. It offers software development, maintenance, and support services; and data entry and business process outsource services. HOV Services Limited company was incorporated in 1989 and is headquartered in Pune, India.

1.Name: Mr. Bhuvanesh  Sharma
1.Title: VP of Corp. Affairs, Compliance Officer & Company Sec.
